column5: This weekend, I'll visite one of my past fishing spots for night time walleye. Usually I run live minnow + lindy rig or 3 way rig due to snagging. Are there any other effective techniques for the night time bite? (the water is pretty fast, at least 1/2 ounce to get to bottom and reel in steady)
I have used glow in the dark jig heads, as well as glow in the dark power baits for nighttime walleye.
Just look to see what others are producing fish on... You are sure to not be alone if your fishing Fenlon Falls.... Minnows almost always out produce everything on the opener up there

RAPALA!!!!!!!!   Night Walleye EAT   Rapala.....  no matter how deep Rapala has an option for you..  My all time BEST night time Walleye color is blue and silver original floating model   I add a few split -shot  depending on the depth.  RFS
